name: Blob - Explorer -Select a folder - Right click to check context menu - new sql script - select top 100 rows

content.query:
-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://bdbjblobstorageqingtest.blob.core.windows.net/container02/New folder 1220/New folder 122002/**',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
